docs.title: JRuby Introduction
docs.text:
This is a placeholder for a JRuby code simulation.

# Sample JRuby code
require 'java'

include_class 'java.util.Date'

puts "Current date and time from JRuby: #{Date.new}"

🚧 Interactive execution is not yet available — this placeholder illustrates syntax and usage.

docs.title: Sample Quiz
docs.text: Test your knowledge with the questions below.

docs.title: 1. What does REST stand for?
docs.text:
• [ ] Random Endpoint Structuring Technique
  • [x] Representational State Transfer
  • [ ] Regular Expression Syntax Tree

docs.title: 2. What is let used for in JavaScript?
docs.text:
• [x] Declaring a block-scoped variable
  • [ ] Declaring a constant value
  • [ ] Defining a function

💡 Answers are not automatically checked in Markdown preview. This is a placeholder only.
